title: How Many Steps Does It Take To Turn an SM R*pe Novella into a Comedy Skit - Novel Updates
tags: Apathetic Protagonist   BDSM   Child Abuse   Cold Love Interests   Flashbacks   Handsome Male Lead   Short Story   Strong Love Interests   Tragic Past   Transmigration   Transported to Another World   Weak Protagonist
author: děng yī   等一
description:
I, a normal, serious, upbeat young adult, somehow, fell into a really unserious SM r*pe 18+ novella.

Oh, it’s a ‘transmigration,’ so just live and let live with the foreknowledge of the plot, I hear you say?

But it was the moment I opened the book, that everything went black, and I got sucked in.

It didn’t even give me a f*cking chance to memorise it for dictation.>
